website_summaries.verdict: The Diamond TC blade sets this one apart from others. It's known for its speed and power.
pros: Tournament-quality racket that is ITTF approved
Expensive, but you're paying for high quality
cons: This pricey paddle may be overkill for the casual or amateur player

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome...
customer_reviews.text: I Have played with this racket for a while and i can say it very professional and its not for amateurs... Racket has good control over the ball and spin is amazin fast Definitely recomemended..
customer_reviews.author: Nemanja NmN

customer_reviews.title: false advertising
customer_reviews.text: I paid over 100 dollars to get a killer spin paddle.. instead I got a stiga cannon 15 dollar paddle. I was excited to give this as a gift but instead I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: vito

customer_reviews.title: Nice Spin and Speed
customer_reviews.text: I recently joined a table tennis group and decided I needed to upgrade my very old paddle to one with newer construction technology. It took me some time to get used to the different sound and feel. My game has improved substantially. This paddle is a bit pricy but after using it for eight months believe it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mc2500

customer_reviews.title: I believe this is a used paddle!!
customer_reviews.text: Is this paddle used?!? How is the word Killerspin correct on one side of the trim and worn out on the other side of the trim and it is supposedly a brand new paddle?!?
customer_reviews.author: Jaytee

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible Paddle! Great feel and takes you game to the next next. To be clear, it includes the rubber on both sides. (One review said otherwise but that was incorrect)
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L.

customer_reviews.title: Looks used not new.
customer_reviews.text: racket looks used when arrived. Not in a sealed manufacturer plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This paddle is awesome! Great speed and spin for days! The people I play with, use lesser paddles and I smash them consistently... Best paddle I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.author: keith frost

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners ;)
customer_reviews.text: Updrading from a DHS with Hurricane 3 and Tin Arc, I have to say i'm impressed. Lightweight and a massive grip are it's strong points, while hard to control for beginners.. Fortissimo rubbers are also very durable. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Cosme

customer_reviews.title: Killer paddle! Experience required to unleash it...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome paddle, has all the power it advertises without compromising on that "killer spin". Requires quite a bit of experience to handle. This paddle really puts the player at a top competition level.
customer_reviews.author: Leo O.

customer_reviews.title: Iraq dep.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely designed paddle, handles well, though it does not have quite as much spin as I expected. A good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: W. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: incorrect listing
customer_reviews.text: This was the wrong product and is not as advertised in the description. This is only for the blade without the rubber. As quoted from the re-seller; "I do apologize it was a mistake on Amazons part there are cross referencing our skus with the wrong pictures. We can either get a return label to get this one back for a refund or issue 10% off the order if you would like to keep the racket you received. Please let us know what you would like to do?" If you just want the blade order it - you want a complete paddle with the rubber then you need to keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: SaxophoneMan

customer_reviews.title: Don't think its preassembled
customer_reviews.text: Don't think its preassembled: Its only the racket without the fortissomo rubers!!!! Don't order if you want a killerspin preassembled paddle....
customer_reviews.author: Arijit

customer_reviews.title: Killerspin Diamond TC Premium
customer_reviews.text: Excellent paddle, great pop, speed, and spin control. Highly recommended.. I have two other Diamond models, and this by far is the best. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: jbatten26

customer_reviews.title: I can hit great backhands & forehands with touch & speed
customer_reviews.text: This paddle is amzing! I can hit great backhands & forehands with touch & speed!! Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: john mcginley

product_meta.title: Killerspin RTG Diamond TC Premium Table Tennis Racket
product_meta.description:
For professional ITTF-competition approved play, tennis table players need paddles with the tightest possible specifications, perfect surfacing, top-line durability and a healthy serving of style and precision. Killerspin Diamond line provides across-the-board design excellence with table tennis paddles that professionals can depend on for speed, performance and control in tournament play. The Diamond TC RTG table tennis racket is an advanced competition racket designed for ping pong players who enjoy an ultra-fast dynamic game. It is a custom designed pre-assembled racket made by Killerspin and built to meet all ttable tennis ournament quality standards and increase the level of your game.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Killerspin was built to bring youth and innovation to one of the world's most beautiful sports: table tennis. The Chicago-based company produces premium-quality table tennis equipment, sports apparel and media. Killerspin was created to serve the table tennis player, while providing U.S. homes and offices aesthetically pleasing table tennis gear for head-turning style and competition-level play.
feature_bullets: 🏓 PROFESSIONAL GRADE EQUIPMENT – Our ITTF-approved competition rubbers and a 7-Ply composite wood and titanium carbon fiber blade will make for some seriously powerful shots. Diamond TC RTG makes an impression on the competition with an elegant, n

🏓 SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION – Our Diamond TC RTG Premium is constructed of the highest quality materials. The blade consists of 5 premium wood layers and 2 titanium carbon fiber layers. Killerspin’s professional grade Fortissimo rubbers provide powerful spin
🏓 ENHANCED ACCURACY – The professional grade rubbers ensure the greatest accuracy with every shot. Ratings are: Control 8.2; Spin 9.4; Speed 10.0.

🏓 PERSONALIZED MEMORY BOOK – – The Killerspin Diamond TC RTG Premium Ping Pong Paddle comes with a personalized Memory Book. It provides excellent protection for your paddle when not in use and also makes the perfect gift box for any occasion.
🏓 COMFORTABLE HANDLE - The handle to this paddle is made to fit with any hand size and feel like you are one with the game.
